resources.string: Hold your device always in front of your body
HelloNavigation was not able to get an initial position.\nPlease enable internet or GPS and restart HelloNavigation,\nor contact our support: HelloNavigation@2imba.de
HelloNavigation is OpenSource and offers\nstep-based and GPS independent navigation.
Please enter your body height, so that your step length can be determined.
Thanks to Madeliniz for the HelloNavigation Logo:\nhttp://madeliniz.deviantart.com
Touch and hold the map to get extra options. So you can set your exact start position.
The body height is an invalid value. Only numbers allowed.
No Result. Check internet connection and try again.

Support HelloNavigation by sending anonymous usage data. This data will help us to improve HelloNavigation. The data are about: device type, sensor equipment and usage of features. The data is completely anonymous. No positions and no private information will be transmitted. You can deactivate usage data sending at every time in settings. Thank you for your support!
Please enable location getting in settings.
Could not get route information. Please try again later.
It seems that you like HelloNavigation. :) \nYour rating would be great support for us!

HelloNavigation recognizes steps by using accelerometer and magnetic-field-sensor data. Every step changes the position in the corresponding direction. Internal error correction guarantees a durable accuracy. The startposition will be located by using either GPS or UMTS/Wifi/GSM locationing. By using internal sensors instead of GPS, HelloNavigation can save up to 80% energy and therefore battery life.

Unfortunately your device does not seem to have a magnetic field sensor (compass). HelloNavigation can not work without that.
More information on our website:
www.HelloNavigation.mobi

Unfortunately HelloNavigation can not initialize your accelerometer. 
For support you can contact us via our website:
www.HelloNavigation.mobi
Your step length is calculated by using your height
Exports the route you walk in a GPX-file on your SD-Card
HelloNavigation can provide location data for other apps.
Use this feature to navigate with other apps stepbased and energy-saving.
HelloNavigation is now running in background
No results were found for your request.
More Info about the specific data can be found under About
Enable GPS to get a better initial position.\nAfter getting your initial position HelloNavigation works independent from GPS! :)
Corrects your position regularly with GPS
GPX-File will be created in Folder \"HelloNavigation\"
Follow our tutorial to store offline maps on your device. Visit our website for more information.
HelloNavigation recognizes your steps by using internal sensors
Be independent from GPS and save up to 80% battery
HelloNavigation is open source and respects your privacy
